live_updates: This issue has been resolved. Thank you for your patience.

49705.summary: Some customers in the Varsity area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
49705.title: May 20 -  Calgary (Varsity) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: We are awaiting restoration of power to our equipment serving the affected areas. Local power companies will be working overnight and into the morning, and once power is restored, services in these areas should begin working. Thank you for your patience.
Several areas have had services restored, and technicians continue to bring remaining areas back online.
Hydro continues to work to restore power.
We continue to await restoration of hydro power to our equipment serving the affected area. Once hydro is restored, services in the area should begin working.
Our technicians will continue working alongside BC Hydro throughout the night to restore services.
To check if your area may be impacted by a Hydro outage, you can check the BC Hydro website at https://www.bchydro.com/power-outages/app/outage-list.html
Tech crews are working to resolve various outages across Vancouver Island caused by extreme wind.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
49663.summary: Due to extreme wind, some customers on Vancouver Island are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
49663.title: May 20 - Vancouver Island | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
